summary: Ac3s' Extended Lakeview Basement Bedroom mod with Noble Beds.  Uploaded with permission.
descriptionHtml:
To quote word for word from Ac3s:
[B][Color=Yellow]"!! Make sure your lakeview manor is completed with upgrades you want to have(benches+steward) before activating this mod !!
!! If you start a new game or switch character you need to deactivate the mod until the manor is build !!"[/Color][/B]

[b][u]HEARTHFIRE DLC REQUIRED[/u][/b]
This mod is restricted to the Nexus only do not upload to any other website
Any change or use of the content of this mod requires the permission of Ac3s

[color=yellow](((((((((((((((Info:)))))))))))))))[/color]
This is an "upgraded" version of Ac3s' Lakeview Extended Basement mod.

This mod is meant for those that want to have the noble beds (the nice looking ones) for the basement bedroom and don't know how to use the CK or fear messing it up. This mod only replaces the original upper class beds (hay and animal skins) with noble class beds (linnen cloth) but does not change anything else.

It is mandatory to copy-paste this mod over the previous basement mod, meaning you should have only ONE .esp file.

So choose either the original basement mod or this mod, but NOT both or otherwise you will get duplicated items all over the interior!

[B]CREDITS:[/B]
VERY SPECIAL THANKS to Ac3s

ORIGINAL MOD - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41854/?]Lakeview Basement Bedroom[/url]
Ac3s' [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31380/?]Lakeview Extended - Hearthfire[/url]
author: Ac3s _Original_----KaiserOmega _Noble_
